thread.title: 45 things you might want to give up for Lent
thread.title_full: 45 things you might want to give up for Lent

author: Adam Boult
title: 45 things you might want to give up for Lent
text:
L ent begins in a few days - but is it still relevant in this increasingly secular age?
The short answer is: yes, of course it is. Many people, whether they're religious or not, use the traditional Christian observance as a time to ditch the habits they feel are having a negative effect on their lives.
But what if you don't know what to give up, but would still like to feel a sense of smug righteousness come Easter Sunday, having successfully given up something you enjoy for 40 days and 40 nights?
When does Lent 2017 start and what is Ash Wednesday? Give up whatever you want, but donâ€™t give up on Lent The cowardly Christian's guide to surviving Lent We've put together this list of 45 things you might like to consider quitting over Lent - and although not all of them are likely to apply to you, we'd like your input.
Simply upvote the suggestions you might consider - and downvote the things you'd never consider giving up in a million year.
